mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (NO) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE QUIT_YN = 'N'

SELECT E.NO ,E.PWD ,E.NAME ,TO_CHAR(E.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE ,E.TEL ,E.EMAIL ,E.ADDRESS ,PROFILE AS profileName ,E.QUIT_YN ,E.LEAVE_REMAIN ,E.USE_REMAIN ,E.BIRTH ,E.GENDER ,E.PROFILE ,E.SIGN_YN ,E.DEPT_NO ,D.TITLE ,D.NO AS DE_NO ,P.NO AS PO_NO ,P.POTITLE FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEPT_NO = D.NO) LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON (E.POSITION_NO = P.NO) WHERE E.QUIT_YN = 'N'
AND E.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND D.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.POTITLE = #{searchValue}
ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT E.NO ,E.PWD ,E.NAME ,TO_CHAR(E.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE ,E.TEL ,E.EMAIL ,E.ADDRESS ,PROFILE AS profileName ,E.QUIT_YN ,E.LEAVE_REMAIN ,E.USE_REMAIN ,E.BIRTH ,E.GENDER ,E.PROFILE ,E.SIGN_YN ,E.DEPT_NO ,D.TITLE ,D.NO AS DE_NO ,P.NO AS PO_NO ,P.POTITLE FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEPT_NO = D.NO) LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON (E.POSITION_NO = P.NO) WHERE E.NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET QUIT_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
